title: What's your new job pay? (optional)?
h1: What's your new job pay? (optional)(to do)?
p1: Tell us your gross pay - before tax and other deductions. You'll find this on your new payslips or ask your employer for details.
payBeforeTax: Enter your pay BEFORE tax and National Insurance
weeklyMonthlyAnnual: Is this your weekly, monthly or annual pay?
